# Royal Mix Global â€“ API Routes Map

## Public APIs
GET /api/public/home
GET /api/public/search
GET /api/public/media
GET /api/public/projects

## Agent APIs
POST /api/agents/register
POST /api/agents/report
GET  /api/agents/commissions

## Media APIs
POST /api/media/upload
GET  /api/media/feed
GET  /api/media/analytics

## Monetization APIs
POST /api/payments/init
GET  /api/transactions/history

## Government APIs
POST /api/government/projects
GET  /api/government/dashboard

## AI Core APIs
POST /api/ai/learn
GET  /api/ai/recommendations

All APIs are Pi Browser compatible and offline-sync ready.
